Dear Mr. McBeath:
Thank you for your letter of December 2. Enclosed is a sample
of our NAEB TV Research Pact Sheets and an Index. Fact Sheets
are priced at 10£ each or -.52. $6 for all those is sued curing the
year. As of January, 19£8, the Fact Sheets will be incorporated
into the NAEB Joums, and will no longer be mimeographed. The

The Fact Sheets are an effort to digest and centralize available
research principally on the effectiveness of radio and TV as

at irregular intervals.
I am also enclosing a list of our materials available for sale.
I think you will be able to find something of interest listed
here. If you desire more information, please let us know.
